content:
There are plenty of places in Bali to rent equipment for water sports. Here are a few options:

1. Rip Curl School of Surf: This surf school in Legian offers surfboard and SUP rentals, as well as lessons.

2. Bali Jetski: Located in Tanjung Benoa, Bali Jetski offers jet ski rentals and guided tours.

3. Nusa Dua Watersports: This watersports center in Nusa Dua offers equipment rentals for a variety of activities, including snorkeling, diving, jet skiing, and parasailing.

4. Kuta Beach Surfing School: This surf school in Kuta offers surfboard rentals and lessons.

5. Bali Wake Park: This waterpark in Benoa offers wakeboarding and other water sports, with equipment rentals available on-site.

6. Bali Hai Aquanauts: Located in Lembongan Island, Bali Hai Aquanauts offers underwater experiences, such as helmet diving and snorkeling, with equipment rentals included.

7. Odyssey Surf School: This surf school in Jimbaran offers surfboard and SUP rentals, as well as surf lessons.
